CustomField.description: Allows users to create a custom fieldset on the Assignment object and write the fieldset's API name to this custom setting. Fields added to this fieldset are displayed as read-only fields on the Multi Assigned Assignment to Milestone UI.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Allows users to create a custom fieldset on the Assignment object and write the fieldset's API name to this custom setting. Fields added to this fieldset are displayed as read-only fields on the Multi Assigned Assignment to Milestone UI.
CustomField.label: Multi Assign Assignment Fieldset Name
